name: Keen
description: A developer-friendly analytics service that helps you create real-time, user-facing dashboards and metrics quickly.

name: Segment
description: A customer data platform that gathers, organizes, and routes user data to your analytics and marketing tools.

name: Countly
description: An analytics and engagement platform for mobile, web, desktop, and IoT apps that securely tracks user journeys.

name: Amplitude
description: A digital analytics platform that helps businesses understand user behavior and optimize product experiences across devices.

name: Google Analytics
description: A free web analytics service from Google that helps you measure traffic, user behavior, and conversion performance.

name: Cyfe
description: An all-in-one business dashboard that brings together analytics, sales, marketing, and infrastructure data in one view.

name: Quantcast Measure
description: An audience intelligence tool that provides real-time insights into visitor demographics, interests, and engagement.
